Source.Name: yasm
Source.Description: Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM-2.10.07 assembler. It supports the x86 and AMD64 instruction sets, accepts NASM and GAS assembler syntaxes and outputs binary, ELF32 and ELF64 object formats.

Package.Name: yasm
Package.Description: Yasm is a complete rewrite of the NASM-2.10.07 assembler. It supports the x86 and AMD64 instruction sets, accepts NASM and GAS assembler syntaxes and outputs binary, ELF32 and ELF64 object formats.
